recipesJson.name: Sa£t by Ckemist: Red Bubba D'licious
recipesJson.author: Ckemist
recipesJson.description:
This Recipe is ONLY for Nic Salt. Ideally flavor % are formulated for a 35mg-50mg range. 

Notes & Subs
Candied Watermelon is the star. No subs. 

Lorann can be subbed for fw or flv

Whipped Cream adds body without tasting it.

reviews.text: Waiting for Candied Watermelon order.. In the meantime, I used this as a base and threw a boneload of Delosi Teaberry in place of both the watermelons and it's killing it in a pod.. I'll update when I mix this up as the intended watermelon.. Figured I'd drop a note for now that this can be a pretty good base for a variety of things that mesh with a pink gum..
